Java Code: grid = new int[2][3];
Pseudocode Equivalent: grid = new array[2][3]
x = grid[1][2]

Java Code: grid[r][c] = r + c;
Pseudocode Equivalent: grid[r][c] = r + c

Java Code: sum = grid[0][0] + grid[0][1];
Pseudocode Equivalent: sum = grid[0][0] + grid[0][1]

Java Code: grid[r][c] += 3;
Pseudocode Equivalent: grid[r][c] = grid[r][c] + 3

Java Code: grid[r][c]--;
Pseudocode Equivalent: grid[r][c] = grid[r][c] - 1

Java Code: matrix = new double[n][m];
Pseudocode Equivalent: matrix = new array[n][m]

loop r from 0 to 1
    loop c from 0 to 2
        grid[r][c] = 0
    end loop
end loop

Java Code: for (r = 0; r < rows; r++) { for (c = 0; c < cols; c++) { grid[r][c] = r * c; } }
Pseudocode Equivalent:
loop r from 0 to rows - 1
    loop c from 0 to cols - 1
        grid[r][c] = r * c
    end loop
end loop

Java Code: for (r = 0; r < 2; r++) { for (c = 0; c < 3; c++) { sum = sum + grid[r][c]; } }
Pseudocode Equivalent:
loop r from 0 to 1
    loop c from 0 to 2
        sum = sum + grid[r][c]
    end loop
end loop

Java Code: for (r = 0; r < rows; r++) { for (c = 0; c < cols; c++) { if (grid[r][c] > max) { max = grid[r][c]; } } }
Pseudocode Equivalent:
loop r from 0 to rows - 1
    loop c from 0 to cols - 1
        if grid[r][c] > max then
            max = grid[r][c]
        end if
    end loop
end loop

Java Code: for (r = 0; r < rows; r++) { for (c = 0; c < cols; c++) { grid[r][c] = grid[r][c] + 1; } }
Pseudocode Equivalent:
loop r from 0 to rows - 1
    loop c from 0 to cols - 1
        grid[r][c] = grid[r][c] + 1
    end loop
end loop

Java Code: for (r = 0; r < rows; r++) { for (c = 0; c < cols; c++) { grid[r][c] = grid[r][c] * 2; } }
Pseudocode Equivalent:
loop r from 0 to rows - 1
    loop c from 0 to cols - 1
        grid[r][c] = grid[r][c] * 2
    end loop
end loop

Java Code: for (r = 0; r < rows; r++) { for (c = 0; c < cols; c++) { grid[r][c] = grid[r][c] - 1; } }
Pseudocode Equivalent:
loop r from 0 to rows - 1
    loop c from 0 to cols - 1
        grid[r][c] = grid[r][c] - 1
    end loop
end loop

Java Code: for (r = 0; r < rows; r++) { for (c = 0; c < cols; c++) { if (grid[r][c] % 2 == 0) { even = even + 1; } } }
Pseudocode Equivalent:
loop r from 0 to rows - 1
    loop c from 0 to cols - 1
        if (grid[r][c] mod 2) = 0 then
            even = even + 1
        end if
    end loop
end loop

Java Code: for (r = 0; r < rows; r++) { for (c = 0; c < cols; c++) { if (grid[r][c] < 0) { grid[r][c] = 0; } } }
Pseudocode Equivalent:
loop r from 0 to rows - 1
    loop c from 0 to cols - 1
        if grid[r][c] < 0 then
            grid[r][c] = 0
        end if
    end loop
end loop

Java Code: for (r = 0; r < rows; r++) { for (c = 0; c < cols; c++) { total[r] = total[r] + grid[r][c]; } }
Pseudocode Equivalent:
loop r from 0 to rows - 1
    loop c from 0 to cols - 1
        total[r] = total[r] + grid[r][c]
    end loop
end loop

Java Code: for (r = 0; r < rows; r++) { rowSum = 0; for (c = 0; c < cols; c++) { rowSum = rowSum + grid[r][c]; } sums[r] = rowSum; }
Pseudocode Equivalent:
loop r from 0 to rows - 1
    rowSum = 0
    loop c from 0 to cols - 1
        rowSum = rowSum + grid[r][c]
    end loop
    sums[r] = rowSum
end loop

Java Code: temp = grid[a][b]; grid[a][b] = grid[c][d]; grid[c][d] = temp;
Pseudocode Equivalent: temp = grid[a][b]\ngrid[a][b] = grid[c][d]\ngrid[c][d] = temp

Java Code: for (r = 0; r < rows; r++) { for (c = 0; c < cols; c++) { copy[r][c] = grid[r][c]; } }
Pseudocode Equivalent:
loop r from 0 to rows - 1
    loop c from 0 to cols - 1
        copy[r][c] = grid[r][c]
    end loop

Java Code: for (r = 0; r < rows; r++) { for (c = 0; c < cols; c++) { diff[r][c] = a[r][c] - b[r][c]; } }
Pseudocode Equivalent:
loop r from 0 to rows - 1
    loop c from 0 to cols - 1
        diff[r][c] = a[r][c] - b[r][c]
    end loop
end loop

Java Code: for (r = 0; r < rows; r++) { for (c = 0; c < cols; c++) { sum2D[r][c] = a[r][c] + b[r][c]; } }
Pseudocode Equivalent:
loop r from 0 to rows - 1
    loop c from 0 to cols - 1
        sum2D[r][c] = a[r][c] + b[r][c]
    end loop
end loop

Java Code: for (r = 0; r < rows; r++) { for (c = 0; c < cols; c++) { prod2D[r][c] = a[r][c] * b[r][c]; } }
Pseudocode Equivalent:
loop r from 0 to rows - 1
    loop c from 0 to cols - 1
        prod2D[r][c] = a[r][c] * b[r][c]
    end loop

Java Code: max = grid[0][0]; for (r = 0; r < rows; r++) { for (c = 0; c < cols; c++) { if (grid[r][c] > max) { max = grid[r][c]; } } }
Pseudocode Equivalent:
max = grid[0][0]
loop r from 0 to rows - 1
    loop c from 0 to cols - 1
        if grid[r][c] > max then
            max = grid[r][c]
        end if
    end loop
end loop
